website_summaries.verdict: Choose this pressure cooker if you want a model that can perform as many tasks as higher-end, higher-priced options.
pros: Affordable, yet offers eight functions in one handy appliance, including steaming and slow cooking
Six-quart size is perfect for most consumers' needs
Touch panel includes 16 easy-to-use preset functions
cons: Some longevity concerns, as a few units failed to work after several months of ownership
Lid seal has been known to fail, resulting in loss of pressure

customer_reviews.title: but realize that this is like parboiling. no browning or crispy crust
customer_reviews.text: I tried this last night for the first time. I did baby back ribs just as per their instructions. they were perfectly cooked, tender and moist. but realize that this is like parboiling. no browning or crispy crust. I put low carb b b q sauce on them and slid them into a 500 degree oven for ten minutes to dry out the sauce a bit. very tasty. the next time I will finish them on a hot b b q grill. my next try will be a chuck roast.' will report after that to see if my rating changes. oh by the way, the unit stay relatively cool on the outside. must have good insulation in it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dunn

customer_reviews.title: --Start - Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, received it today and tried for the first time.... Hard boiled eggs (yet not boiled)... Put eggs in, two cups water and pressed two buttons.... 7 min. later..... Perfect! Impressed.... Let me play with this and I'll update! #icookcosori Day 5, and 5 days in a row we've used this. Love it. Chicken tacos from a FROZEN block of chicken to red in 15 min.... Last night did baby-back ribs in 32 min... Great!
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unsed four times now doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Used four times since purchase. Today the pressure cooker turned on by itself so I unplugged the unit. Tonight I started to cook wings and the unit is stuck on reheat mode. Unplugged unit to reset it to no avail now all lights come on and stay on and I am unable to change by pressing any of the buttons. May be a hazard as the unit turned on and started beeping suddenly today even though unit was left in the off position. Sounds like something is shorted in the display or board to me. This has not been moved, abused, wet (other than the stainless pot itself).
customer_reviews.author: Kriquette

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, should have gotten an InstaPot instead
customer_reviews.text: I am a seasoned chef, but can’t figure out how to CLEAR previous setting no matter what I do. Extremely frustrating. I pressure cooked a ham bone 30 min. In this unit, but the unit won’t clear the prior setting (even if unplugged for 25 min)! I will now need to wait until tomorrow to finish my soup. Bad product, should have gotten an InstaPot instead!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jewelsmom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely frustrating. Broke on 4th use.
customer_reviews.text: Literally used it 4 times and it won’t turn on. Stopped working in the middle of the last use. Thankfully I was able to cook the rest of the meal on the stove. And it broke 10 days past the return window !
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE It!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this two weeks and already gave it quite a work out. I've used it as a vegetable steamer, for cooking brown rice, a slow cooker and a pressure cooker. Yes it's big and heavy but it takes the place of 4 appliances and I'm sure I'll find ways to make it take the place of more. I'm collecting recipes and adjusting those I have on hand. This is so easy to use, my husband -- he who burns water -- manages just fine [sticky note on cabinet with "press this..then this...then this"] which is nothing short of a miracle. Very easy to clean! This is my new go-to appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I selected this product because of stainless steel liner and reviews. Are the reviews bogus? I suspect so as my pot can’t cook rice... as per directions. Rice is wet or because I didn’t hear the timer burnt on the bottom as it went into “warm mode”. The sound is difficult to hear. So I set a timer as a back up. Meat is cooked but not paliable. Set at max time it comes out better. I cook for my sick dog so I’ll keep it and make it work. Maybe other functions work better. Hope so but with technology I’m very surprised. My $15 burner top pressure is my go to when cooking for people.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: The Best Kitchen Appliance Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was using this within an hour of receiving it to make savory chicken strips. Easy to use and this unit comes with a small cook book. So far all are pro's and not a con in sight. Full featured, and unlike most kitchen appliances, this one will be used almost daily. Also to facilitate the slow cook option they include a glass lid. Also a steamer rack and a couple of utensils. And if you like fermented sticky rice there is a recipe and a pre-set button for this too. I researched scores of these and in my humble opinion you really cannot go wrong ordering this one!
customer_reviews.author: Stv

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great, Until it Didn't
customer_reviews.text: This pot worked GREAT for a few times. The last handful of attempts have been a major struggle due to the lid not properly sealing - this results in the pot failing to pressurize. The lid and pot and seal are clean and free of foreign objects, I can't diagnose the problem other than it doesn't properly fit. I am giving two stars instead of one because it did work a few times and we were able to see how good a working pot is. Somehow steam is releasing where it shouldn't and this one is a dud. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Leiv

customer_reviews.title: Pot is excellent all components are of high quality
customer_reviews.text: Learning how to use it. Pot is excellent all components are of high quality, inner pot heavy and solid, much better than the thin none stick pots. My first try was pork carnitas , using sauté mode and cooking under pressure , they were a hit. Next Corned beef and cabbage, slow cook for 4 hours and added vegetables and finish pressure cooking for 20 min. The best is that everything can be done in one pot, sautéing and cooking, less to clean up, love that. Getting ready to try rice and pasta. Up to now excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja B

customer_reviews.title: I just wanted to say the most amazing thing was the amazon prime shipping
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say the most amazing thing was the amazon prime shipping, ordered on a Saturday afternoon, said free shipping arriving Tuesday and then low and behold it arrived on Sunday the next day!!! Extremely well packed, even tripled boxed, arrived in beautiful condition. The presets are so intuitive, I picked up a whole chicken, placed it in the pot with 4 cups water and some seasoning, put on the lid, plugged it in, pressed poultry and then start. So simple and turned out great after about a 6 minute heat up, then 15 minute pressure cook, then automatically went to warm. Very impressed so far, can't wait to try other things with it!
customer_reviews.author: fatherof4

customer_reviews.title: I love almost everything about this pot
customer_reviews.text: This will make my second pressure cooker. I love almost everything about this pot. Stainless steel interior pot is a MUST! Very easy to use. Great size for my family of 4. The only thing that I the other pot had that was better was the pressure cooker value. My old pot was always in a locked position so you just had to push the button to release pressure. With the Cosori, you have to remember to turn the knob back if you have released pressure. It doesn't happen often, but it's just another step. For future upgrades to the pot, this is the only thing I would change. Not a deal breaker. This is a great cooker!!
customer_reviews.author: thd

customer_reviews.title: Poor company support, no parts available
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cooker just over a year and now it leaks through the pressure release valve. As a result, the unit will not come to pressure. I contacted Cosori to BUY another pressure relief valve and they told me no parts are available for sale and since I was over the 1 year period, tough do-do. I loved the cooker and used it at least once a week but the customer support is non-existent. I do not recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6Qt Pot on July. Works perfectly until the end of Nov. Somehow, the steam leaks from the rim of the cooker right before it reaches the pressure. I send a email to their customer service with a short video. Within 2 hours, I got a email reply and told me the cooker is defect and offered a free replacement item. This is one of the best customer service I have ever deal with. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: yu jiang

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: the replacement pressure cooker broke 4 months later again. I don’t know if I keep getting defective machines or the fact I use it EVERYDAY but today while cooking with it, it stopped working. I contacted the company for my money back so let’s see. The first pot I bought broke within 4 months but the customer service is exceptional. When I contacted Cosori that the pressure cooker stopped working, they responded to my emails immediately and sent me out a new cooker! I’m hoping this one lasts a little longer since it’s so easy to cook in it and nothing sticks in the stainless steel pot! I absolutely love this pressure cooker!
customer_reviews.author: BUZ_TUED

customer_reviews.title: Problems sealing-fixed by reseating valve
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for Christmas presents. Neither sealed until the seal/unseal valve was removed and reinserted. Not sure what that did, but it worked. Maybe not seated correctly at assembly or a piece of debris or flash stuck in valve? The company help line suggested I check this valve for the proper number of ridges, which is why I pulled it off in the first place. The valves were not the defective ones they suspected. Also, one pot had a one inch spot that was extremely hard to slide the seal under. The help line wasn’t too concerned about that. I wonder if bending that wire slightly out to ease the pressure would inhibit sealing? Otherwise, the pots work beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: The food is delicious and easy to make
customer_reviews.text: The Cosori 6 Qt Premium 8-in-1 electric pressure cooker is life changing! Okay, it sounds silly, but when you don't have to plan a meal by how much time it needs to slowly cook on the stove or in a crock pot to get tender, it opens up a lot of choices! I cooked a whole cauliflower in just a few mins and a stew with chicken gizzards(notoriously tough) to fork tender in 30 mins! WOW!!! The food is delicious and easy to make. I loved the extra sealing ring and crock pot glass lid that came with it. I'm going to make sooooo many stews and soups and beans and chili and ancient grains! WOO HOO FREEDOM!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pressure Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Received my pressure cooker at 8am, and I was making yogurt in it by 9am. The start Guide is really easy to follow, and set up is a breeze. I was pleasantly surprised that it comes with an extra seal and with a recipe booklet, which is a plus. Now, why 4 stars instead of 5: I had to run the yogurt-boil setting 3 times to get the milk to 180 degrees (it should take only one time). So far I'm loving it. And I will update this post after more use.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best kitchen addition I've ever purchased, short of a microwave. Cooks as advertised- fast and keeps meat moist all the way through. Easy to use- toss in meat, sauce, extras, and close it up for 30 to 45 minutes. Clean up is fast and easy. Even burned bbq sauce in the bottom (fixed by lowering the temp when cooking after the first use) fell right out like a nonstick pan. Amazing gift for anyone moving into their own apartment, house, or even moving into a dorm and dont want to buy campus food everyday.
customer_reviews.author: PBZ

customer_reviews.title: Got this mainly for use as a Yogurt Maker.  Doesn't work as a Yogurt maker.
customer_reviews.text: I've made yogurt many times manually so I do know how to do it. The yogurt function on this device DOES NOT WORK. Period. This is probably why they removed the recipe for yogurt from the new version of the manual. Furthermore although they claim it has a Stainless Steel bowl it rusted out on the first use (Blackeyed peas and hamhocks cooked over night) It's worked great as a steamer/pressure cooker but ONLY like that. Get a better known brand than this piece of JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT! We'd buy it again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this somewhere and mentioned it to my wife. It piqued her interest so I bought it for both of us as a Christmas present. It's fantastic! Perfect for folks like us who like our stews, our soups, our rice, our steamed veggies, etc. We load it up, plug it in, set the "menu" and let it cook as long as necessary. When we get back home from the day's work/chores dinner's ready. This is one of our favorite cooking accessories. Simple, effective, easy to clean, great results and stores well. We liked it so much that we bought a couple for our adult "children".
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service redeems the broken first pot
customer_reviews.text: The first one couldn't hold pressure and then the console simply wouldn't work. Customer service promptly walked us through the problems and, indeed, we were right it was broken. They simply sent us another one and now we have duplicates (spares). And the second one works fine. Three stars because they sent us a broken pot and the hassle of diagnosing and then waiting for a new one. and 4 stars because it eventually works as expected which averages to 3.5 Stars, rounded up to 4. I'm cautiously hoping it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not the best review....LOL
customer_reviews.text: I admit it.... the only reason I bought this is the yogurt setting. And, to date, that's the only thing I've used it for. So.... it makes great yogurt. Really great. (Okay, the recipe plays a big part in that, I admit.) Still, even the best recipe will fail if made in a pathetic appliance. Maybe one day I'll try making something else in this pressure cooker. Maybe. In the meantime, know that the instruction manual is easy to understand, the appliance is easy to operate and clean.
customer_reviews.author: pen2b

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this product!! I use it 3 times a week at least. Easy to program. Comes with every thing you need to be successful!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bai

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing so much, but the pressure valve broke because of poor construction...Just tiny little plastic pieces that really need to be made out of a metal material perhaps...Called the manufacturer and they were awesome as far as customer service and replaced it but even the replacement piece had one of the three little brackets broke it already by the time it came to us so we’re having to figure out something other than that the machine itself is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Equestrian82

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed !!
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty disappointed with this pressure cooker. The steam keeps coming out from around the sealed lid area. And due to this the food burns. I checked with my friends who are using other brand electric pressure cookers and they told me it never happens with them. The steam will come out with a loud whistling sound and i have to run and switch it off. I am scared using it and leaving the house while food is cooking in it. The whole purpose of it is defeated. Dont know what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sachn Gogia

customer_reviews.title: Set Cosori to slow cook for 8 hours at 193 degrees (settings recommended by Cosori)
customer_reviews.text: Slow cook function does not work properly or as expected. During first use of brand new unit, attempted to slow cook a 2-1/2 pound roast with cut-up potatoes, carrots & onions (in beef broth). Set Cosori to slow cook for 8 hours at 193 degrees (settings recommended by Cosori). At end of 8-hour cooking time beef still not fully cooked and vegetables greatly under-cooked - still quite raw and "crunchy". Throughout cooking cycle display indicated selected temperature (193 degrees) was being maintained, but no visible cooking activity noticeable through glass cover (did not remove or open glass cover throughout entire cooking period - kept it tightly closed). Very disappointed in performance of Cosori. Will not use it again.
customer_reviews.author: William Steele

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase.. When it decides to work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack in early August and I loved it. For the first few months it worked like a dream and it was incredibly convenient. But here we are, a few months later and now every other time I use it there will be no pressure build up. Even with all things closed. Getting a lot of burnt chilis and roasts. I strongly recommend you get a pressure cooker/instant pot, but not this one. I wish I could still return this one....
customer_reviews.author: Nick Iannarino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric pressure cooker!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was always fearful of traditional stove top pressure cookers. This is a gift to be treasured. I am still learning all that it has to offer (have prepared chicken recipes and wonderful soups and stocks with it to date. I LOVE this Cosori! So glad to add it.to my kitchen....I may move my crock pot to storage as the Cosori is many pots in one, extremely versatile. Thank you Cosori.
customer_reviews.author: spirits&angels

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I DON'T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT CHEWY MEAT NOW, I GOT THE BIG ONE. WHEN I COOK A DISH IN IT, I SORT IT OUT INTO BAGS AND HAVE A GOOD FROZEN DINNER OVER THE NEXT WEEK OR TWO. I DO HAVE TO GO TO UTUBE TO WATCH HOW TO MAKE SOME OF THE DISHES. IT IS BIG SO BE SURE YOU HAVE A NICE BIG SPACE TO STORE IT IN.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Chastain

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for a second FAUX Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to have and use as a second countertop pressure cooker - and it has been a DREAM! I know that many people say that you only need one, but when you are feeding 6-8 people daily or have large parties of guests, having a second pot for rice, pasta, veggies, etc is SO handy! I use it exactly as I use my IP, in regards to loading and times. I have not had any issues and will probably buy this brand instead of another IP when mine finally bites it.
customer_reviews.author: Creating Everyday

customer_reviews.title: Better Than An Instant Pot For Less $$$
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Cosori product but I'm impressed by it's function and value. Prior to the Cosori I've had 4 Instant Pots, all which have failed within a year. It's important to say here that I use my Instant Pots often. They are my primary method of cooking. The Cosori is holding up well so far. My only complaint is the lack of availability of extra cooking pots. Come on Cosori get with it ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: So Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this almost a year ago. I am so happy with this cooker. I use it very frequently making dinners and 3 times a month making homemade cat food for my kitty with IBD. It is holding up very well and I have ZERO complaints... well I wish I would have gotten the larger one with as much as I use it, but that is on me, lol. Hands down the best purchase I could have made.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Donym

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD BUY!!! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I love my Cosori pressure cooker! I researched this brand and compared it with the more expensive Instant Pot (since it's all the rage) and found they basically had the same ratings but this brand was less expensive. It also came with a glass lid attachment and an extra sealing ring which the Instant Pot did not have. I've cooked 6 meals in it and they all turned out VERY good! There are a lot of recipes on Pinterest to try out 😊
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: OMG we love this pressure cooker!! We’ve only had it about 2 months now and I don’t know what took us so long to make purchase. We’ve made fall off the bone bbq ribs 2-3 times, soups, chicken and noodles, pork loin, beef roast, etc and everything has been simple, fast and yummy!! We use it at least once a week or more and still have many recipes to try in it!
customer_reviews.author: SharIe Cline

customer_reviews.title: Designed to break!
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning, I was really happy with the Cosori, but it comes with only a 1-year warranty and it stopped functioning after 17 months. The manufacturer told me that I had exceeded the warranty limit and would not replace it. This device is designed to break. I will replace it with the original Instant Pot (which has 88% four & five star ratings and is $20 cheaper!)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew4549

customer_reviews.title: If you have kids in sports, you need this.
customer_reviews.text: Cant say enough good things about this version of the instapot. Its a pressure cooker and a croxk pot and you can saute in it... we use it for everything from boiling eggs to corn on the cob to stews and chili and soups, its endless. Its easy controls. If you have any trouble you probably washed it and got the gasket out of positiin. Correct that and your back in business.
customer_reviews.author: jeff cergnul

customer_reviews.title: Dead after a year
customer_reviews.text: I had the pot for a little over a year. I needed a rice cooker and thought why not get a pressure cooker and slow cooker in the same unit. The item was sturdy but the fit and finish was not high quality but it worked well...until it didn’t. After about less than 50 pot of rice, the unit does not turn on. I’m going to get another one from a well known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ott Sompol Miller

customer_reviews.title: Only time will tell how the Cosori performs
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well, so far. The sticker glued to the cover came undone (see photo) the first time we used it. The Instant Pot that we bought also has a sticker on the cover but hasn’t come off. I consider this a manufacturing defect. This sticker would need to be improved and replaced. The company has the address of all those who have registered their warranty and could therefore send this sticker in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This pressure cooker comes with many extras that are extremely helpful and add to this kitchen appliance!
customer_reviews.text: All the many features it offers! I especially like all the extras that arrived with it in the box! Register your appliance within 14 days and you receive an extra warranty year free! It was package well, arrived safe and sound and within a few days of ordering it! Can't wait to use it tomorrow! It also comes with a recipe book! Thanks for a super great product!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: You can have your Instant , I'll keep my Cosori !
customer_reviews.text: I also have an Instant Pot and in my opinion , this is hands down much better and less money. I love the rack for wings and shreaded beef.
customer_reviews.author: james r miller

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the Corsori. Been using it frequently, never realized how much easier it would make cooking stews. The other day when the stew meat was not tender after cooking (not usual), it was not a problem to put the lid back on and cook another half hour to make it very tender. Cleaning is a bit of a nuisance since you're supposed to remove the silicone ring and metal cap over the safety valve every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this COSORI 6 Qt Premium 8-in-1 Programmable Multi-Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love this COSORI 6 Qt Premium 8-in-1 Programmable Multi-Cooker! [[ASIN:B07414FZLW COSORI 6 Qt Premium 8-in-1 Programmable Multi-Cooker (Pressure Cooker, Rice Cooker, Steamer, Warmer, Etc.), 1000W, Includes Glass Lid, Sealing Ring and Recipe Book] ]I bought this Cooker for my daughter-in-law and she has been using it nearly every night since. The ways to use it are endless The book that came with it offered nice recipes and a great guideline on how to cook various kinds of things like beans, etc.! We highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Margalit Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Worked less than one year
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year inot the two year warranty it died. Started cooking and was getting hot and pressurized rhencame back to a blank screen. Left unplugged for several minuts and plugged back in and still nothing. Will reach out for warranty replacement once their office is open.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Moller

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it!
customer_reviews.text: We love to cook, we've tried many things in this, and followed the recipe book, many things don't turn out done or finished or taste that well, I've double checked directions and we are following to the letter. It's just not working out for us, not all that convenient, our Air Fryer is used all the time, this now sits in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: R. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Better deal than Insta-Pot....and works better too! Don't be sucked into the brand name game
customer_reviews.text: So far really liking it. Wish it would get to temp sooner, but that's the same with all of them. I love that it has extra spare parts just in case. Only reason it's not a 5 is cuz i haven't figure out how to get the yummy smell to totally go away on the lid. Even after washing in warm soapy water, it still smells like the previous food. Unless you make rice, then there's not much smell. But the lid does smell like the yummy chicken I made. Makes me hungry just smelling the lid! LOL. I might just need to wash it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: B. Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for exactly a year. The warranty ends today and my item stopped working yesterday. Every time I plug it in and press any cooking function, my kitchen power trips! Cosori’s power turns on but it can’t cook anything. I use it just once a week on weekends at most so I’ve hardly used it maybe 30 times or so. I emailed customer service since it hasn’t been a year since the delivery date. Let’s see if the issue is resolved. I do like the product. Update: Customer service sent me a new item. Thank you. Working great.
customer_reviews.author: S. P

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product!
customer_reviews.text: I got my Cosori 8qt pressure cooker 3 weeks ago and I love it. I've did beef stew, eggs, corn on the cob, ribs, and shrimp it was all so good. and so easy to fix If your looking for a pressure cooker, then you need to look at the Cosori it's great. I love that you get the glass vented lid, and the rack is nice and high.also you get a extra sealing ring. I would recommend this Cosori to anyone looking for a pressure cooker
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about 3 months, then caput
customer_reviews.text: I loved this machine. I accidentally bought it, thinking I was getting an Instapot - was suckered into an Amazon deal. And apparently you should not go off-brand. This thing was so great, cooked so many great proteins quickly for me for months. Then suddenly a few weeks ago, the pressure valve on top just stopped working (Wouldn't seal). Now it's broken and useless to me. Time to go get an Instapot.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M

customer_reviews.title: #icookcosori#iloveit#
customer_reviews.text: I gifted my wife Cosori for Eid. we were looking for an instant pot for the very long time and found the best deal on Cosori. I am happy that we bought it. Good price and amazing item, as my wife is a chef and she enjoys cooking. she enjoys using new gadgets. Amazing product, along with the pot we got a recipe book, extra sealing ring and steamer rack. the user manual is simple so that everyone can understand the product to his or her level. I would recommend my family and friend for Cosori.
customer_reviews.author: hk90

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have owned it for a little while (about 4 months). Thus far, this product has worked well for us. All the functions we tried worked as expected. The default for yogurt (8 hours) did not work as expected, but increasing the time to 9 hours fixed the issue. This could just be the culture we were using. We have cooked a lot of Indian dishes in it and so far we found it useful and more than enough for our family of four and guests. We do *not* regret buying a larger pot. This size has worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer Dude

customer_reviews.title: I was cooking in 15mins!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! First recipe that jumped out at me as soon as I unboxed it was Gen Tso’s Chicken. I tossed everything in and it was ready in 20mins! It is very well constructed using a heavy gauge stainless steel for the internal pot. It also comes with a second glass lid - so depending how you use it you would use the pressurized lid or the glass lid. A very nice bonus. The price is awesome and it is very easy to use. Clean up was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Playtow

customer_reviews.title: Defective Pressure Release Valve?
customer_reviews.text: I was so thrilled when receiving my cooker and couldn't wait to try it. The problem is the pressure release valve doesn't stop when moved to the closed position. It just spins all the way around. I am so disappointed in this product! Unless there is a solution that I do not know of this is the last Cosori I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J. Sorn

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome find this was
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome find this was. I had never considered pressure cooking until I talked to a friend who also has this same pressure cooker. I have tried numerous dishes since I received it two days ago and everything (hard boiled eggs, green beans, potatoes, pulled pork, sweet corn, etc.) has turned out perfectly cooked and delicious. I recommend this cooker to anyone who wants to make great meals in less time with little clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remove cosori pressure cooker,they are DEFECTIVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS I HAD FOR 5MONTHS AND STOP WORKING I CALL CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THEY TOLD ME THEY CAN'TDO NOTHING ABOUT IT .COSORI ARE DEFECTIVE,NOT RECOMEND, MY SISTER BOUGHT ONE AND IT WAS DEFECTIVE TWO. DON'T BUY THEY COME DEFECTIVE, I BOUTH ONE COSORI FOR 5MONTHS AND THEY DO NO ACCEPT THE RETURN THE SAME THING HAPPENED WHIT MY SISTER IN LESS THAN A MONTH SHE RETURNED
customer_reviews.author: barbyseba

customer_reviews.title: Product does work well, although from time to time ...
customer_reviews.text: Product does work well, although from time to time we experience issues whereby it does not start cooking right away. It may take unplugging it and letting it sit for a few minutes. We haven't figured out why this happens - I have the warranty on it and think I may ask for a replacement if it does it again - but otherwise it does everything as advertised. I've had it for about 9 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rissoto rice done perfectly in 7 min.... What else do you need to know?
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say... I use it for everything! I love it. Definitely takes some getting used to if you have never used a pressure cooker, your mind tells you things shouldn't be done yet. But it usually is! I would but this again and again. The one touch buttons are there but I seem to use the manual settings more often then not so I can dial in the timeand pressure I want based on the recipe. I made perfect rissoto the other day and the rice was cooked perfectly in 7 minutes with no constant stirring, anyone who has made risotto would probably buy this just based on that!
customer_reviews.author: Joby

customer_reviews.title: Very tight rubber seal to the lid.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product as a present, but my friend who received complained about tightness of the rubber seal to the lid when I went to their party. It was embarrassing as I knew this defect when I receive a previous model of Cosori as present I experienced the same problem. I did not think the same could have happened to the present to my friend. Could you ask the manufacture to send me a replacement lid and rubber? If I do not hear from you, I'll initiate a return process. thanks, Shigeru
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Valve won’t stay sealed and hot food sprays all over.
customer_reviews.text: Pressure valve won’t stay sealed and after multiple attempts to use it, had oatmeal splattered all over counter, cabinets and ceiling. The thing is scary and doesn’t work! I wish I had thought to return it when still could, but I stored it away and forgot about it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose COSORI!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research prior to purchasing my Cosori Pressure Cooker. It quickly became my most used kitchen appliance and even purchased another for my daughter as we were able to cook healthy amazing soups and other dishes in less time and almost always improved flavors. When one of the Cosori Pressure Cookers I purchased stopped working correctly, I was even more pleased than ever with Cosori’s superior customer service. They were courteous, concise and efficient. It’s been one week since I initially contacted Cosori and today I received a new replacement Cosori Pressure Cooker! Thank you so much Cosori! I will continue to purchase and recommend your products!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: Had for little over a year and in the middle of cooking a meal it went dark. I thought maybe it was the outlet tried different outlet and nothing. After it cooled tried to see if anything was between the pot and burner but nothing. No reason at all I can find for it to have died. It was the 1st time I had used the sauté setting. I was using the pressure setting when it blacked out and steam was leaking a bit but that has pretty much been from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after second use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is in March of 2018 mainly to cook brown rice. Then the wife announced she was off carbs. The cooker sat in the original box until the second week of February 2019. I made black bean soup the first try and it turned out great. I tried to make polenta on the second the try and the pressure valve broke so the unit will not come up to pressure. Two of the flanges broke off of the pressure valve (as shown in the 2nd photo).
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it was bought for a gift. Needless to say the machine doesn’t lock and is broken. Hopefully I can be taken care of. Didn’t see another way to have this resolved. And the box was burned before he even plugged it
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hibner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service and Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with my Cosori. It always performed just as expected for about 16 months until one day when I was cooking poultry, the display went dark. I called customer service. Much to my surprise and delight and with no questions asked other than "Can you provide your shipping address via email?" Three days later a brand new one arrived in the mail. Now that is a great product and customer service! Definitely a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Ria Michaels

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when i ordered this. it was amazing the first few times i used it and then it just crapped out. it won't get to pressure and cook. it just keeps trying to build pressure and i have checked everything. i followed all directions in the manual and its not working. definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I am an Instant Pot groupie but did not want to spend that money again to furnish an apartment I will be using for a few months so I tried this instead. I am quite pleased with it. They only issue I have is having to remember to push the start button. Everything so far- hard boiled eggs, yogurt, vegetables- have come out perfectly! I definitely recommend for those not willing to spend the extra money on an Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brison

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much I use it almost every day
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much I use it almost every day, and the meat is so tender and moist, also cook whole potatoe's and then you can put them in your fridge and just reheat them in your microwave. They are so fantastic.I cook sweets in it, just so many things, I could say,just buy it you will not be unhappy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It was easy to use and clean. However, it quit working mid-pressure cook while I was making soup and I have not been able to get it to turn back on. I had made about a dozen or so meals in it during the 9 months I had it. I tried letting it cool off, jiggling the cord, using a different outlet, all to no avail. Disappointed because I really liked it. Unfortunately, they only have a 30 day warranty on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer in Austin

customer_reviews.title: The unit doesn't seal well it's difficult to get it to close properly.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly like the unit but it has started to malfunction. Recently it has started just popping off kinda Italy doesn't fly off but everything starts to expel the steam. I've only used it maybe 8 or 9 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I only wish I would have bought it years earlier
customer_reviews.text: Love the Cosori Electric Pressure Cooker. It works perfect EVERY time. The food tastes absolutely delicious. The ease of operation is so fast and easy. You can put in frozen chicken breasts and 25 minutes later dinner is ready! This is a Must Have for every cook's kitchen. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorie K.

customer_reviews.title: We use this at least every other day.
customer_reviews.text: We don't know how we lived without one of these in our lives. We use it for everything from pressure cooking ribs before they go on the smoker, to preparing entire meals in less than an hour without having to stand over the stove. We just put everything we want for the meal (the meat, vegetables, potatoes, seasonings, and very little broth) into the pot, put the lid on, press a couple of buttons and within an hour, we have a complete meal.
customer_reviews.author: Christal Wade

customer_reviews.title: Pray you don’t get an e4 error
customer_reviews.text: I’ve throughly enjoyed this cooker for just a little over three years...until it threw an e4 error! I called Cosori and was basically told that it is now a useless piece of junk. Nothing they could do. Maybe I’ll plant flowers in it! From the internet research I’ve done, the InstantPot seems much easier to fix. I’ll be replacing it with an InstantPot.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Beware............. 90$ paper weight with no customer service
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this product for a little over a year now and it's still under warranty. I'm busy, just like you probably are so I don't have time to read user manuals. Luckily this thing is easy to use and intuitive. Just lock the lid and press the preset buttons for a quick and easy cook. Once it is on, you can walk away and come back when you hear it beeping. All this is great except the steam valve will not longer hold any steam. I emailed customer service and they have not gotten back to me. This is upsetting. I paid 90$ and now its a 90$ paper weight or maybe I can use it for fondo!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hall

customer_reviews.title: but I like it. It is a bit complicated to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the Insta pot very long, but I like it. It is a bit complicated to get used to programming the cook times, but other thatn that the food tastes great and cook time is amazing. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: a great do-it-all (almost) cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought because I needed a pressure cooker. Have used it for stews and stuff and really like how easy it is to use - you will have to adjust to higher sea levels though - i live at +5300 ft. which means I have to add to the time and temperature listed in the booklet. A great value for the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Z

customer_reviews.title: NOT A 6 QUART, ONLY HOLDS 4 QUARTS
customer_reviews.text: Unit works great but it says it is a 6 Quart capacity. It only holds 4 quarts. The "cup markings in side " show only 12 cup capacity - it is marked incorrectly - it holds 16 cups
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooking Device!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome all-in-one cooking device! I am very impressed by its design and multitude of functions. The entire product, from packaging to the manual was well made and intelligently designed. It cooks food fast and easy and I can use many of the instant pot recipes availables. I highly recommend this for anyone looking to boost their cooking abilities and make delicious food fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Buying "like new" product will not disappoint!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The description stated "LIKE NEW" !! Umm, seller misrepresented the description! Should have described it as "BRAND NEW with exception of the box"!!!! I could not believe the price I paid for the magnificent product I received!!!! I should have ordered 2. It didn't come with a user manual not cookbook. This seller didn't disappoint. Both are included as a downloadable PDF!!! Great job!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Better than machines that cost twice the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace another electric pressure cooker that was much more expensive and this one is SO much better. Super easy to make adjustments and has a ton of features and extras. On our last pressure cooker it was always a guessing game to know if we had the lid seated just right so it would lock and come to pressure: with this machine it beeps to let you know you have it on and locked before it even comes to pressure.
customer_reviews.author: The Nosy Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Great Multicooker
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy this instead of the InstaPot. It is well made and we have used it quite a bit to make quick meals. Meats, stews, beans even cobbler is great with this unit. If you are in the market for one of these, this is well made and very versatile,
customer_reviews.author: Scott Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in 2018 and right after the manufacturer's warranty ran out it broke down and won't light up or work. I reached out to customer support and they said it was outside the warranty so there is nothing they can do. I will not buy the brand again.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Worked one time out of five hence one star.
customer_reviews.text: The single star is for the single time this pot worked properly. The last time I used it is shown in the picture. If you want your meals to look like that pork loin by all means buy this pot. The valve never seals and 4 of 5 times I used it could open the pot any time I wanted. The burn factor shown it never reached pressure nor did the cook timer start. I simply boiled my pork loin. Now the stainless crock is toast.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: So far this pot is great. Works like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: So far this pot is great. Works like it is supposed to, and makes a variety food fast and easily. The stainless steel pot is great and the fact that it comes with a glass lid and you can watch your veggies steam makes it even better as to no more overcooked vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This company has fabulous customer service. I had owned the cooker for about 6 months when is suddenly quit working in the middle of a cooking cycle. I emailed the company and they responded right away. After giving them my info, they sent me a new unit which arrived within a few days of my initial email. No other questions asked. Fabulous! As for the cooker itself, I love it! Once you get it, you want to start making everything you possibly can in it, lol! It’s kind of addictive. My sister has an Instant Pot, but this cooker has more versatile settings, plus you get an extra silicone ring and glass lid. So great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I have this item for almost two years, and i have nothing bad to say about this cooker. works fine, get my rice cooked perfectly, less sticking and less time spent worrying about it. Excellent - no power issues, leaks, other issues that i can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Warehouse Snatcher

customer_reviews.title: Easy home cooked meals
customer_reviews.text: Seriously WOW!! Dinner takes so much less time! I find watching YouTube videos with recipes rocks too! Made beef stroganoff in17 min!! Meat fell apart tender. While it pressurizes I just clean up the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Misty Darling

customer_reviews.title: I'm loving this pot!
customer_reviews.text: I've used my stove top pressure cooker for YEARS and loved everything I made in it. THIS electric pot is just fabulous! This is also a great deal with the extra seal ring and the glass lid for non-pressure cooking. The only reason I gave it only four stars is because the legs are uneven and I've had to shim up one side.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie T.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Cosori!
customer_reviews.text: I owned an old pressure cooker 30 years ago and every time that I used it, I was so scared of it! That's how long it had been since I had used one. I am extremely happy with the Cosori pressure cooker. I have used it for cooking a pot of beans, roast, beef stew, and ribs. It is so easy to use and clean. It is not noisy nor scary to use. I love it and highly recommend this brand. The free accessories that come with is an extra bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria G.

customer_reviews.title: Have to say... Better than Instantpot?!?
customer_reviews.text: I bought the InstantPot for my daughter and this one for my family. I am sure they each do what they are supposed to, but I just felt this unit had a few more bells and whistles to help us newbies get into the pressure cooking world.
customer_reviews.author: WisconsinEh

customer_reviews.title: Cooking made easy.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used for multi cooking as of yet. But started off with cooking rice and additives came out a perfect cook. My only issue is when the pressure cooking knob is set to close it turns 360 degrees. So at times not for sure that the pressure is closed for cooking. But the item works good with multi cooking functions and security features.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pressure Cooking! It will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THING!! It will change your life. I can't speak for "Instant Pot" or other brands as this is my first pressure cooker. However, the simplicity and efficiency of pressure cooking totally converted my lackadaisical view of cooking.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great until it gave out in the middle of cooking a roast, I had to finish the roast on the stove smh. I only had it for 3 months, used it about 8-10 times. Now it will not power on at all. Make sure you buy a warranty if you take a chance on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Cole

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy a different brand. This is the first review I’ve ever left, because this thing is that bad. We tried using it for 3 months now. It doesn’t matter what you do, two thirds of the time it won’t hold pressure and the steam explodes out of it. Try again and it may work. Who knows? Completely random. We’ve given up trying to use it because it won’t work anywhere close to reliably. It’s great when it works, but you can’t predict when it will. Unless you want an explosive kitchen humidifier, and then it’s pretty reliable. Buy a different brand, you’ll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Get one you will love it
customer_reviews.text: The Cosori pressure cooker has all of the bells and whistles.The first meal I made was from their included book and came out very well.It was easy to figure out the controls and the total time to prepare and finish the meal was about one hour start to finish.for beef stew. very easy clean up and saved a lot of work as everything was done in the pot. It is very well made and feels of quality construction. I hope to get the bonus extra year warranty which they offer. All in All i am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my Cosori for almost a year now and my pressure valve had a piece break off. I called customer service who patiently walked me through each step to figure out the exact issue. They sent me a new pressure valve- at no charge- and it arrived in less than a week. Crazy enough, the same piece broke again, and without question, they’re sending another replacement. Yeah, it may be frustrating when it breaks, but the A+ customer service & quick responses (e-mail response within 2 hours!) makes this one of the best purchases I’ve made in awhile. This thing has been so handy in the kitchen and makes cooking so much easier. 100% would recommend Cosori to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby J.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good design
customer_reviews.text: I hate this cosori. I can Never get the pressure valve set. I clean/wash it. It’s a waste of time because you have to stop the cooking and try to reset the valve. I would not recommend this product for that reason alone. Wish I had returned it before the window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: I really love this all in one pressure cooker. I was looking for one that I could delay the start time and also I could manually adjust the pressure. This one does both. It also comes with a clear lid and extra seal, bonus. Only con that I can find is that the lid does not have a spot to sit like an instant pot, so you have to put it on the counter or sink and it is usually dripping. Small price to pay. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instead of the competition because of the added features and much better quality and better looks. I've tried about a dozen recipes and all have turned out very good to great. I'ts very easy to use and clean and super easy to make great and speedy meals with.
customer_reviews.author: 16copper

customer_reviews.title: Quick cooker perfect for quick nutritious  meal in a hurry
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot, bought one for my daughter. She cooked a roast so fast. I bought myself one love it. Plan to order more
customer_reviews.author: Rise H

customer_reviews.title: Spits steam out during cooking. Scares whoever is cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: Spits steam out during cooking. Scares whoever is cooking in kitchen. Unexpected. Dogs go hide. Missed return by one day. Yes seal is in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lera

product_meta.title: COSORI CP016-PC Electric 6 Qt 8-in-1 Instant Stainless Steel Pot Pressure Cooker, 6 Quart
product_meta.description:
Size:6 QuartCombining the Best Kitchen Tech 

This premium 8-in-1 programmable kitchen appliance has new and improved programs and features to continually support your fast-paced, health-conscious and lifestyle. This machine keeps you safe with an unlock indicator, which illuminates if the lid isn’t properly secured. We’ve also added 3 newly cooking programs: Hot Pot, Pasta/Boil and Sauté/Brown. Also included is a recipe book packed with delicious meals designed especially for one-pot pressure cooking. Other non-pressure functions include traditional slow cooking (with high, normal and low settings) and yogurt-making (with a high setting ideal for pasteurizing, and a low setting ideal for glutinous rice). Of course, a manual cooking mode allows you to select your own pressure and temperature levels.


Thoughtful Design This new appliance is equipped with a large LED display and new smart custom programs for easily adjusting cooking settings and pressure levels, or stopping/canceling the cooking process at any time. We use the latest technology to monitor pressure and temperature, keep time, adjust heating intensity and duration, and control cooking temperature curves precisely for the finest results. Greatly improve your cooking results, and consistently so! The Cosori Pressure Cooker is carefully designed to protect you from many overlooked errors. It’s also ETL, FCC, & FDA certified and maintains 10 proven safety mechanisms to give you uncompromised safety and peace of mind.
feature_bullets: Note: Do not immerse the base in water or spray any water inside the housing;Always check the parts inside the lid to make sure they are not damaged or cracked.Please note that this voltage only applies to USA and Canada

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,509 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
